title: Neurodivergent Home Care System
description: A comprehensive home care routine designed for ADHD and autistic individuals. Uses micro-tasks, sensory-friendly approaches, and habit stacking to make household management sustainable and less overwhelming.

setupSteps.question: What's your biggest household challenge? (cleaning, organizing, maintenance, or all of the above)
What time of day do you have the most energy for household tasks?
What sensory experience helps you feel motivated? (music, audiobook, podcast, silence, specific lighting)
What's one small household task you already do consistently? (e.g., make bed, wash dishes, feed pets)
How many minutes can you realistically dedicate to household tasks each day? (Be honest - start small!)
